page.title: 11Summer- by Michael Horovitz
page.content: Red Admirals -a slug supris'd big ones-exquisite blackly coils pansy-velvet glistening slime ruby-rich marking worming slow tiger lily-tasting snakes the grass tortoiseshell antennae pointing meadow brown mind darts and cabbage whites to the distant ^ aimless flutter waterfall yet elude ripple of leaves the cupped hand shifting the ^ ...canny gliders! breeze to settle on Their wild wingbeats spin me frantic red ant-like ^ -dazed and amazed insects to bid join small colonies in mad flight, mating on wheat- sun-dancing ear in spite of these and rose bay unaware feet willow herb. of Mine (cont.)
